text: Maybe if the US had done the 2 week mandatory quarantine at the beginning of this instead of thinking the idiots that inhabit this country would just listen and stay home, we might not be in this deep. Look where we are compared to everyone else now

NEW: Americans say they were doused in bleach after authorities in Peru detained them in a mandatory coronavirus quarantine. (We have obtained video from the incident below). The State Department has raised the issue with Peruvian authorities. https://www.washingtonpost.com/national-security/peruvian-authorities-spray-americans-with-bleach-like-chemical-after-holding-them-in-coronavirus-quarantine/2020/04/08/245d6708-78fa-11ea-8cec-530b4044a458_story.html?arc404=true
A mandatory federally-mandated quarantine could get us out of this hell hole by summer, but “state’s rights.” Leaving it up to the states has always worked for us in the past.

Not just another Saturday night during quarantine, but #nationalbeerday, and #socialdistancing continues. Chilling on my patio, by myself, drinking a @cptlawrencebeer Mandatory Training NEIPA, and trying to maintain… https://www.instagram.com/p/B-lR1DHpRe5/?igshid=1xppeqdio0gkb
Instead of threatening that those who assemble would have a mandatory 14 day quarantine, make it 14 days in a jail cell. No excuse for endangering innocent lives of people who aren't religious nuts.

Without mandatory social distancing or extensive test/contact trace/quarantine, what explains Japan’s remarkably low mortality rates? https://www.wsj.com/articles/japans-coronavirus-cases-fall-sharply-without-compulsory-measures-11587993871?emailToken=8e97249a1bb322040fbb4daae1d1460bGH4rQbP4F0vZqnxeT2FObEsCl5wMmae3ScrIXI6fLy7eZNWRVOi9gC/XT6Eahu+3+7DNUMB3LomYMggRFhHm78mYVDS4wXUuQCYiDxR5rzSM5cICkxcbc/TME12TDJgQ&reflink=article_copyURL_share

Quarantine mandatory weight cut is going well. I’m hungry and weak.
I’m heading home mbak. Since the commencement is postponed indefinitely and classes are moving to Zoom, it’d be better to go home for good. Gonna have 14-days mandatory quarantine tho.

The biggest constraint to an effective state response is testing, but it looks like that gap is closing. Will the governor have the guts to implement mandatory contact tracing/testing/quarantine? What privacy sacrifice would you make for public health? https://twitter.com/markrhill/status/1246817819204952064?s=21
Tate Reeves could’ve put a mandatory quarantine on the state, but yes I guess https://twitter.com/FOX13Memphis/status/1252998360086315008
God bless you all in this trying time during mandatory quarantine! Stay positive and love each other! Lmao
Should Governor Reeves issue a statewide mandatory quarantine for the state of Mississippi?

I am lucky enough to live in a clear zone. The county south of me is light red, where my Pts live is dark red. On 3/17, the city 10 miles north went on suggested in-home, on 3/24 mandatory quarantine. No known cases thus far.

NEW: Michael Avenatti has been released from NY federal jail this morning after a mandatory 14-day quarantine, his attorney Dean Steward confirmed to Fox News and adds “We're really gratified that the judge took the action that he did.“ #Avenatti #MichaelAvenatti @MichaelAvenatti

Covid-19 quarantine hit me at a time when I’m super busy. Mandatory WFH looks the same as reg WFH. I’m fine, but this event will change things. My employer may ask me to WFH full time to save $on rent? Do we need ties to work? No! We r animals still need human interaction tho.
All it took was a global pandemic and mandatory quarantine for me to figure out how to play music in every room of the apartment at once. We’re rich now. It feels as though we are rich.
Since my job knows that people are under mandatory quarantine they feel entitled to give us mandatory work to do over the weekend and I really don’t appreciate that. I’m so tired.
China ending there mandatory self quarantine is an indicator at how long it will take. They ended it yesterday after 79 days.....I believe we are at 39 days so another 40 days I’m assuming.

Life turned upside down overnight for so many, including students at Columbia University, read this first hand account of my dear friend’s journey from NYC straight to a mandatory quarantine at a hotel in Singapore. She is due to be released on April 14th:

Quarantine Mandatory Guidelines: 1. Wake up before 9am 2. Write 3 things you’re grateful for 3. Move your body before 10am 4. Eat 1 protein rich meal before noon 5. Choose 1 task to get accomplished 6. Do one mindless activity 7. Read for 10 min or meditate for 3 min
i really hope they put a mandatory quarantine out bc no one is fucking listening and this shit will just continue to drag out.. let’s get this over with and move forward
Was tested for the Coronavirus and I’m on “mandatory quarantine” until my results come back... When telling @rachel_k_5 she laughed at me

“We have thus far released 1,235 people from mandatory quarantine, this is good news as well.” States Dr. Whalen reminding “all of the precautions we’ve been talking about still need to be put in place.” @WNYT & “all of these tests have to be appropriately vetted,”antibody tests.

The numbers are definitely higher than what’s being reported, and that’s because there isn’t enough tests. On top of the 129 confirmed cases, there are 236 in “mandatory quarantine”... Meaning that’s at least an additional 236 presumed to be positive without being tested.

A woman w/COVID in her 70’s died last night in Albany Co. She also had underlying health conditions says @MCCoyCountyExec Adding the total deaths is 9. W/309 positive COVID19 cases, & more than 400 people under mandatory quarantine. 13 adults he says are in ICU, @WNYT
